text: The First Teacher () is a 1965 Soviet drama movie directed by Andrei Konchalovsky.Пять российских фильмов участвуют в Берлинском кинофестивалеПЕРВЫЙ УЧИТЕЛЬ It stars Bolot Beyshenaliyev, Natalya Arinbasarova, and Idris Nogajbayev. == Actors == * Bolot Beyshenaliyev as The school teacher Dyuyshen * Natalya Arinbasarova as Altynay * Idris Nogajbayev as Narmagambet * Darkul Kuyukova as Koltynay * Kirey Zharkimbayev as Kartynbay * Baken Kydykeeva as Chernukha == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1965 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Andrei Konchalovsky
title: The First Teacher
